Desc.entry: Part of Recycle Bikes(see separate entry). The registered charity runs cycling events and rides for young people aged 4-18 years and adults. Has a fleet of bikes including BMXs, mountain bikes and jump bikes as well as a variety of safety equipment such as helmets, gloves and pads and qualified and experienced staff. Offers mountain bike rides in the local woods or the Peak District. Runs a free BMX club on the last Saturday of the month, normally from March to October. Runs a portable North Shore, which is a specialized bicycle obstacle course, including ramps, balance beams and see-saws. It has been used at open access events and large festivals such as Cliffhanger and the GoFree festival. Please check the blog for details of future events.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
